product_description: A durable canvas bag patterned in neutral awning stripes is trimmed with faux leather and fitted with adjustable straps for comfortable crossbody carrying.
product_details_and_care:
A durable canvas bag patterned in neutral awning stripes is trimmed with faux leather and fitted with adjustable straps for comfortable crossbody carrying.
Top zip closure
Removable, adjustable crossbody strap
Exterior flap pocket with push-stud tab closure; slip pocket
Interior media and zip pockets
Print lining
Textile/polyurethane
Imported
